_comment: ROI Configuration for Traffic Counting. Coordinates are in pixels. Adjust based on your video resolution.
_calibration_tip: Use video player with coordinate display or annotation tools (LabelImg, CVAT) to determine exact coordinates

roi._note: Region covering left side of road where vehicles move toward camera. Adjust to match your video.

counting_line._note: Horizontal line that vehicles cross. For 'toward_camera', vehicles cross from higher Y to lower Y.

roi._note: Region covering right side of road where vehicles move away from camera. Adjust to match your video.

counting_line._note: Horizontal line that vehicles cross. For 'away_from_camera', vehicles cross from lower Y to higher Y.

note: IMPORTANT: These are example coordinates for 1920x1080 video. You MUST calibrate these values for your specific video source. See CALIBRATION.md for detailed instructions.
